title: Amateur Liga VideoSpiel - Fly T League
body:
We are glad to announce that we have already created the new Amateur Videogame League, called FLY T League.

The league is going to be made up by, at least, 8 teams from Silver 5 to Platinum 5.
"Point's league" is how we are gonna work, same as football.
WIN=2points DRAW=1 Point LOSS=0 Points

Games are going to be played on a "Best of 2".
The league is gonna finish when every team plays eachother at least 2 times (4 games). Also same as football.

If you are interested, add me:

**SYHDE**

-Do not reply this post, add me.
-Only team that are already created, not "currently building..."
-Only players between Silver 5 and Platinum 5.
-If a team leaves the league, that team and all its players are going to be permabanned from any other contest.
-A signing up term is going to be made during 4 days every month, till the end of the league.
-Games are going to be played every Saturday at 22:00 (10:00 pm), unless 2 team agree to postpone it.
-Every decision is going to be notify to the league with 1 day's notice.
